===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A brownish-black pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to support the ''healthy energy and consolidate the essence'', to nourish [[yin]] and kidney, to address diuresis in the treatment of frequent micturition, precipitant urination, urinary stuttering, hematuria, chronic prostatitis, and hypertrophy of the prostate".

Qianlieshu pills have the following herbal ingredients:
